Package UIs.Buyer.Controllers

package UIs.Buyer.Controllers
This package contains all the controllers used for the BuyerMenu.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    UIs.Buyer
    This package contains all the classes related to the Buyer's UI.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CartController
    Class that represents the controller of the shopping cart so that the buyerMenu is not overloaded.
    CatalogController
    The CatalogController class represents a controller responsible for managing the interaction between the buyer user interface and the catalog, allowing the user to browse, search, and interact with products and sellers.
    OrderController
    Class with utilities related to a product.
    ProfileController
    Class with utilities related to the buyer's profile.
